Key Match Events: Ty Jerome posted a career-high 24 points on 9-for-15 shooting overall and 4-for-7 from three-point range against the Charlotte Hornets.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers decided to rest Donovan Mitchell against the Charlotte Hornets, and Ty Jerome started in his place.
Post-Match Reflections: Ty Jerome responded by posting a career-high 24 points on 9-for-15 shooting overall and 4-for-7 from three-point range, and the Cavaliers went on to route the Hornets 128-114.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ty Jerome has been sensational for the Cleveland Cavaliers this year, averaging 10.7 points, 2.1 rebounds, 3.7 assists, and 1.2 steals while shooting 59% from the field and 54% from three-point range.
Others: The Cavaliers are 15-0 this season, and Ty Jerome's play has been a significant contributor to their success.
